page.title: 15Family Life cont.
page.content: (Continued from previous page) We usually have tea at about 17.00 but on Monday,Wednesday and Friday it is later because my dad gets in later from work.After our meal I sometimes watch T.V. and then I help mum wash the dishes.After this I either go out to play with my friends or do my homework (if I have any).Between 19.00 and 20.00 I get ready for bed and watch T.V.until 21.00 when I usually go to bed. ************* {Recently the school has changed its {time of closing from 16.00 to 15.20. {This does not appear to have caused {any problems.However some working {parents have had to make arrangements {to have their children looked after {until they get home.}
